verses.roman:
prabhura upadeśāmṛta śune yei jana
acirāt milaye tāṅre kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; upadeśa-amṛta—the nectar of the instructions; śune—hears; yei jana—anyone who; acirāt—without delay; milaye—meets; tāṅre—him; kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana—the treasure of love of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Whoever hears these instructions given to Sanātana Gosvāmī by the Lord comes very soon to realize love of God, Kṛṣṇa.
